page.title: 06ALMONDSBURY FORGE.
page.content:
The{Forge}has been in Almondsbury for 250 years, and the owner has been associated with it for all his working life. Soon he will be 80. He started work there because "the pay was good in those days".Orginally it was a {shoeing forge.
Today the forge specialises in making{gates}and{ornaments.}Mild steel is used these days as opposed to iron before. The charge is Â£8 per hour of work. The Forge is operating 6 days a week and is very busy.
The owner sees forges changing in the future and says women work just as well as men,though there are more men employed there.
